page.title: 11Colvend: Home Life
page.content:
My name is Marian and I live in Colvend.I am 9. Ihave a brother who is 11 and a Mum and Dad.When I get up in the morning I get dressed and have my breakfast. When I come home from school at 3.30pm I have something to eat and watch T.V. We have dinner at 5 o'clock. At night we all watch the News on television. On Thursdays my brother and I go to piano lessons.Then we go to a Bible Study meeting.
My name is Sarah.I am 8. My Mum and Dad own a hotel in Kippford. There are five bedrooms for guests.It has three floors and I live on the top floor. My bedroom has a little bathroom with a shower,sink and toilet.When I get up in the morning I watch T.V. and have my breakfast. When I come home from school I play outside,then have my supper and go to bed at 8 o'clock.
